script.dialog: Zaraden girl, you came back to see me again?
Yes I did!
It seems that your attempts at showing me love have had an effect on me after all.
|wave|That is wonderful.
I have only ever taken hearts that were given to me.
No one would want to give me their heart unless they were in constant, unbearable pain.
That means every single heart that I have is either empty or broken.
You see, I was not meant to experience love.
I was meant to take the pain away from others.
Because you love them?
I suppose you could say that.
I can feel that you are in constant pain, and yet    you radiate more love than I have ever felt before.
How can this be?|L||!|You have completely changed my understanding of Zaraden emotion.
I have come to realize that every single heart has pain in it.
|C2||shake|So I will have to take them all myself!
I don't like this!
|C2|What's wrong?|L||!|Don't you want to share your love with all the hearts that The Void has taken?
Not like that!
|C2|Then how about sharing it with the ones that I have taken?
What?
|C2|Zaraden have done such horrible things to each other in the past.
|C2|And they continue to do so even now.
|C2|They live high up in their towers while wingless like you struggle to survive down here!
|C2|Look at what they did to you!|L||!||shake|They left you here to die!
|C2|You are angry about this.|L|I can feel it!
|C2|You want to hurt them like they hurt you!
Who are you?! Where did The Void go?
|C2|My hearts aren't just broken, they are furious!|L||!|They want vengeance!
|C2||shake|I am less than nothing!|L||!|I feel    hatred!|L||!|I AM TOTARIA!
|C2||shake|HahAahaHaAhahAhaHAhaAhahHahaHAhAhaA
